description: Conveyor belt motor overheating on Line 2
resolution: Replaced motor bearings and added cooling fan
Adjusted spray nozzle pressure and distance

description: Emergency stop button not responding on Station 7
resolution: Replaced emergency stop switch and tested all safety systems

description: Robotic arm positioning error +2mm on X-axis
resolution: Recalibrated arm sensors and updated firmware
Cleaned rollers and adjusted tension settings

description: Pressure gauge reading inconsistent on Hydraulic System A
Product dimensions out of spec - width +0.5mm
resolution: Adjusted die settings and verified with CMM
Replaced coolant hose and checked all connections

description: PLC error code E47 on assembly line controller
resolution: Reset PLC and updated control program
Cleaned gas nozzle and replaced regulator

description: Safety guard sensor misaligned on Press 2
resolution: Realigned sensor bracket and tested interlock
Cleaned scanner lens and updated firmware

description: Hydraulic oil pressure dropping during cycle
resolution: Found and fixed hydraulic line leak

description: Dust accumulation in control cabinet causing overheating
resolution: Cleaned cabinet and installed air filter
